section.title: Exponential Models

subsection.title: Fitting an Exponential Function through Two Points
subsection.p: To write a formula for an exponential function, we need to know the initial value, a, and the growth or decay factor, b. We can find these two parameters if we know any two function values.

section.p: In this section, we introduce a new mathematical tool called a logarithm, which will help us solve exponential equations.
